text: (nabiye!) allahge dayave hetuvenma oba ovun kerehi adaraya karanneku bavata pat vuvehiya. oba særaparusa sit ætteku bavata patva sitiyehi nam, oba vetin ovun pæna diva gos ættehuya. ebævin ovunva (ovunge papayanta) oba samava di (deviyangenda) ovunta samava dena men illa sitinu mænava! tavada (yuddha samadanaya adi) an karanavanhida, ovun samaga sakaccha karaminda sitinu mænava! (yamkisi karanavak kirimata) oba tiranayak gatahot allah matama oba visvasaya tabanu. (mandayat) niyata vasayenma allah (tamanva) visvasa karannanva priya karanneya
